name: Natasha Wlasoff
title: Trimmer
coverLetter:
Hello,

I have been a passionate patient for 7 years. In my experience manicuring cannabis, I learned the distinction of strains, differences in density, color of leaves and the subtle scents the flowers themselves. Friendly and focused, I am accustom to long hours and consecutive shifts; can trim up to 2 lbs. a day.

Before my brink into the industry I worked in restaurants, retail and as an office assistant. I can communicate well with customers and colleagues and complete tasks swiftly and on time. My aim everyday is to be punctual, efficient and positive. I am searching for a long-term position in the cannabis industry specifically as a Trimmer. I have reliable transportation and availability.
experience:

QUALIFICATIONS

Quick-learner, Good Judgement, Time Management skills

Focused, Motivated, Compassionate

Attention to detail, Interpersonal skills

 

EXPERIENCE

Healing Touch                 2018 6 months

Post-Harvest Technician   Sun Valley, Ca

  • Removed water leaves of various species of hanging dry plant.
  • Using own shears, bin, gloves, etc. the stems are removed and flowers manicured.
  • Detailed, fast, with direct attention to quality of the product.
  • Daily average 2 lbs. per 8+ hours; Optimal collection/separation skills
  • accustom to long hours consecutive days, and breaks between harvests.

 

Med Men              2017 4 months

Post-Harvest Technician   Sun Valley, Ca

   • Handled plants durring drying process, picking water leaves, and assessing humidity.

   • Upon careful removal from drying rack, 5 rows appointed to me are weighed.

   • The product material is removed from the stem, or trimmed on the stem and left to cure

   • Trimmed the flower loose or close, whatever is best for the best outcome of product. 

   • Kept close attention to quality, removing any premature flowers, mold, or damaged material.

   • Manicured an average of 1.5lbs. per 8 hours, maintained a clean and safe work area.

 

Pitfire Artisan Pizza        2016             8 months           

                       Server        Pasadena, Ca

  • Provided customers a pleasant dining experience, filling drinks and delivered plates promptly. 
  • Full knowledge of menu, seasonal items ready with recommendations. 
  • Kept clear communication with customers as well as with colleges.                
  • Created a safe environment and cleanly restroom, upholding company standards.                          
  • Accuracy in cash handling, receiving multiple orders all with a smile.                                                        
  • Frequently and carefully carrying +35lbs, keeping Front Of House fully stocked.
  • Experience behind bar pouring beer and wine or mixing simple drinks.
  • Occasionally serving for catering events or parties.       
  • Upheld excellent customer service; welcoming regulars, tourists and newcomers.
